name: artist_website
description: This is a mobile responsive artist website

scripts.build:css: npm run clean && npm run build-css
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run watch-css & nodemon server -e js,jade
scripts.uglify: mkdir -p public/js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -o public/js/app.js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -c -o public/js/app.min.js
scripts.build:imagemin: npm run imageminPhotos && npm run imageminSVG
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:imagemin && npm run build:uglify

author: Stephen Grable
